name: Ghost Town (itch) (drewswisher)
description:
When the people of Orchid Springs die, they become residents of Ghost Town - a spectral village that exists right on top of Orchid Springs, unbeknownst to the living world. You play as Ronnie, the newest member of Ghost Town. Ronnie is special: she's the only ghost who can still interact with the physical world, so she quickly becomes the errand girl for every ghost who needs literally anything. By talking to and running errands for these ghosts, Ronnie is able to help them find peace and move on from this mortal coil.

Z to Talk

C to Interact with Objects

WASD to Move

Credits

Wolfgang Wozniak - Development
Drew Swisher - Music
Chris Burke - Game Design, Story
RJ Clarke - Pixel Art
